misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom rand1 = new SecureRandom(seedBytes);        
SecureRandom rand2 = new SecureRandom(seedBytes);
description: Using the same seed for multiple instances of SecureRandom does not provide sufficient randomness and could lead to predictable output.
recommendation: Use SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong() to obtain a strong instance of SecureRandom which uses a cryptographically strong pseudo-random number generator (PRNG) algorithm.
